title: How to come into real life from a highly imaginative life? What are the steps - Quora

response.answer_text: Coming to reality can be really simple. Start making plans on what you want in your life.Pick 2 or 3 of these goals as the priorityStart planning out the actions you'll take to achieve those goalsBreak it down to the smallest action and start taking it.Prioritize going out of your house rather than thinking about thingsSurroud yourself with action takersKeep on encouraging yourself to step outI believe those are the steps…
